alert.note: Alert for Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 4:15PM EDT until March 15 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph late today into this evening. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Western Passaic County. In New York, Orange and Putnam Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Scattered power outages due to snow load are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
